title: HTML input with datalist test
description: A sample datalist attached to a text input. Provide feedback on this test and results in [issue #73](https://github.com/accessibilitysupported/a11ysupport.io/issues/73)

output.output: text input was focused
"Edit combo"

"Function type Combo box, has auto complete, editable. Blank."

text input was focused
"Edit combo"
"Function type Edit combo, to set the value use the arrow keys or type the value."

chrome.notes: The role is not consistently conveyed across browsers, and is often presented with a modifier ("combo" or "has popup") to convey the presence of the datalist.

suggestions were displayed

chrome.notes: The datalist is conveyed as a menu as opposed to a listbox.

output.output: "Blank", skipped the suggestions and started reading the content after the input.
"Blank", skipped the suggestions and started reading the content after the input.
"function, 1 of 6, selected"

edge.notes: The datalist role is implied by the "combo" role and "suggestions" announcement.

output.output: "function, row 1 column 1"

chrome.notes: The datalist role is implied by the "has auto complete" announcement for the text input, combined with down arrow navigating suggestions. However, table semantics were also announced when none exist.

output.output: "Blank"

firefox.notes: The datalist role is implied by the "has auto complete" announcement for the text input, combined with down arrow navigating suggestions. However, all options are announced as "blank".

output.output: "function, prediction"

ios_saf.notes: Suggestions are listed in the normal virtual keyboard predictions. However, there is no indication that these predictions are suggestions from the website, and may be confused with the normal virtual keyboard predictions.

output.output: not possible to navigate to datalist and suggestions are not announced
When the end of the list is reached, down arrow loops back to the start, but no announcement was provided for start or end of list.
"Blank", skipped the suggestions and started reading the content after the input.
"Blank", skipped the suggestions and started reading the content after the input.
"function, 1 of 6, selected"
"async generator function, 6 of 6, selected"
"row 1" was announced when first entering the datalist, however that is not expected and there is no indication when the end of the list is reached."
all suggestions are announced as "blank", with no indication of boundaries.
"Function, prediction"
"Function, prediction"

ios_saf.notes: Boundaries can be implied by the role of "prediction" being announced for each available prediction. In other words, when the user hears a different role announced, they can assume they left the predictions.

history.message: Add assertion for position in set information for the option element
